document.full_text: the opening of a key spillway to relieve flooding along the mississippi river could create logistical headaches for big gulf coast refiners, but will likely spare the lion's share of the area's refining capacity from flooding danger.
document.title: floodway opening a blessing for louisiana refineries
lines_and_colors: the opening of a key spillway to relieve flooding along the mississippi river could create logistical headaches for big gulf coast refiners, but will likely spare the lion's share of the area's refining capacity from flooding danger.
